short_summary: High-Precision U-Pb Age Dating of rock and mineral samples
description: The Department of Natural Resources Canada (NRCan) has a requirement of High-Precision U-Pb Age Dating of rock and mineral samples in support of TGI-6 ore systems research.
duration_in_months: The expected Contract End Date is 2024-05-31
